document.title: On the Same Team: Locker Room Talk, Student Athletes, and a Call for a Restorative Justice Approach to Sexual Assault Education
document.publication-title: Tennessee Journal of Race, Gender, & Social Justice

field.name: acknowledgements
field.value: Assistant Professor of Public Policy and Administration and Director of Dispute Resolution and Conflict Management, Boise State University. At the time of the symposia, the author was Clinical Professor of Law and Law College Title IX Coordinator, Michigan State University College of Law.
